alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 28 at 10:42AM CST until March 02 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...Until Wednesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 30.0 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested and is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow evening and continue falling to 17.2 feet by Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Noxubee River Macon 26.0 30.0 Mon 10 am CS 26.8 23.7 21.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 7 PM CST.
